component.name: MainScene
component.script:
sub init() m.top.backgroundURI = ""
m.navBar = m.top.findNode("navBar") m.homeScreen = m.top.findNode("homeScreen")
m.navBar.observeField("selectedId", "onNavChanged")
' Start on Home m.navBar.setFocus(true) end sub
sub onNavChanged() id = m.navBar.selectedId
if id = "home" then m.homeScreen.visible = true ' when you add SearchScreen, youâ€™ll set it false here else if id = "search" then ' show a SearchScreen once implemented ' m.searchScreen.visible = true ' m.homeScreen.visible = false end if end sub
